00058 union Node;

00060 struct InternalNode {
00061     /* Treat as bitfield, bit N indicates whether child N exists or not */
00062     unsigned char has_child;
00063     /* Treat as bitfield, bit N indicates whether child N is a leaf or not */
00064     unsigned char child_is_leaf;
00065 
00066     /* Can have up to eight children */
00067     Node *children[0];
00068 };

00099 /* Doesn't get directly allocated anywhere, just used for passing
00100    pointers to nodes that could be internal or leaf. */

00103     LeafNode leaf;

00362     int numChildrenTable[256];
00363     int childrenCountTable[256][8];
00364     int childrenIndexTable[256][8];
00365     int numEdgeTable[8];
00366     int edgeCountTable[8][3];
00367 
00369     void buildTable()
00370     {
00371         for(int i = 0; i < 256; i ++)
00372         {
00373             numChildrenTable[i] = 0;
00374             int count = 0;
00375             for(int j = 0; j < 8; j ++)
00376             {
00377                 numChildrenTable[i] +=((i >> j) & 1);
00378                 childrenCountTable[i][j] = count;
00379                 childrenIndexTable[i][count] = j;
00380                 count +=((i >> j) & 1);
00381             }
00382         }
00383 
00384         for(int i = 0; i < 8; i ++)
00385         {
00386             numEdgeTable[i] = 0;
00387             int count = 0;
00388             for(int j = 0; j < 3; j ++)
00389             {
00390                 numEdgeTable[i] +=((i >> j) & 1);
00391                 edgeCountTable[i][j] = count;
00392                 count +=((i >> j) & 1);
00393             }
00394         }
00395     }
00396 
00397     int getSign(Node* node, int height, int index)
00398     {
00399         if(height == 0)
00400         {
00401             return getSign(&node->leaf, index);
00402         }
00403         else
00404         {
00405             if(hasChild(&node->internal, index))
00406             {
00407                 return getSign(getChild(&node->internal, getChildCount(&node->internal, index)),
00408                                height - 1,
00409                                index);
00410             }
00411             else
00412             {
00413                 return getSign(getChild(&node->internal, 0),
00414                                height - 1,
00415                                7 - getChildIndex(&node->internal, 0));
00416             }
00417         }
00418     }

00422     void printInfo(int st[3])
00423     {
00424         printf("INFO AT: %d %d %d\n", st[0] >> minshift, st[1] >>minshift, st[2] >> minshift);
00425         LeafNode* leaf = (LeafNode*)locateLeafCheck(st);
00426         if(leaf)
00427             printInfo(leaf);
00428         else
00429             printf("Leaf not exists!\n");
00430     }

00458     int getSign(const LeafNode* leaf, int index)
00459     {
00460         return ((leaf->signs >> index) & 1);        
00461     }
00462 
00464     void setSign(LeafNode* leaf, int index) 
00465     {
00466         leaf->signs |= (1 << index);
00467     }
00468 
00469     void setSign(LeafNode* leaf, int index, int sign) 
00470     {
00471         leaf->signs &= (~(1 << index));
00472         leaf->signs |= ((sign & 1) << index);
00473     }
00474 
00475     int getSignMask(const LeafNode* leaf)
00476     {
00477         return leaf->signs;
00478     }
00479 
00480     void setInProcessAll(int st[3], int dir)
00481     {
00482         int nst[3], eind;
00483         for(int i = 0; i < 4; i ++)
00484         {
00485             nst[0] = st[0] + dirCell[dir][i][0] * mindimen;
00486             nst[1] = st[1] + dirCell[dir][i][1] * mindimen;
00487             nst[2] = st[2] + dirCell[dir][i][2] * mindimen;
00488             eind = dirEdge[dir][i];
00489 
00490             LeafNode* cell = locateLeafCheck(nst);
00491             assert(cell);
00492 
00493             setInProcess(cell, eind);
00494         }
00495     }
00496 
00497     void flipParityAll(int st[3], int dir)
00498     {
00499         int nst[3], eind;
00500         for(int i = 0; i < 4; i ++)
00501         {
00502             nst[0] = st[0] + dirCell[dir][i][0] * mindimen;
00503             nst[1] = st[1] + dirCell[dir][i][1] * mindimen;
00504             nst[2] = st[2] + dirCell[dir][i][2] * mindimen;
00505             eind = dirEdge[dir][i];
00506 
00507             LeafNode* cell = locateLeaf(nst);
00508             flipEdge(cell, eind);
00509         }
00510     }
00511 
00512     void setInProcess(LeafNode* leaf, int eind)
00513     {
00514         assert(eind >= 0 && eind <= 11);
00515 
00516         leaf->flood_fill |= (1 << eind);
00517     }
00518     
00519     void setOutProcess(LeafNode* leaf, int eind)
00520     {
00521         assert(eind >= 0 && eind <= 11);
00522         
00523         leaf->flood_fill &= ~(1 << eind);
00524     }
00525 
00526     int isInProcess(LeafNode* leaf, int eind)
00527     {
00528         assert(eind >= 0 && eind <= 11);
00529         
00530         return (leaf->flood_fill >> eind) & 1;
00531     }
00532 
00534     void generateSigns(LeafNode* leaf, unsigned char table[], int start)
00535     {
00536         leaf->signs = table[leaf->edge_parity]; 
00537 
00538         if((start ^ leaf->signs) & 1)
00539         {
00540             leaf->signs = ~(leaf->signs);
00541         }
00542     }
00543 
00545     int getEdgeParity(LeafNode* leaf, int index) 
00546     {
00547         assert(index >= 0 && index <= 11);
00548         
00549         return (leaf->edge_parity >> index) & 1;
00550     }
00551 
00553     int getFaceParity(LeafNode* leaf, int index)
00554     {
00555         int a = getEdgeParity(leaf, faceMap[index][0]) + 
00556                 getEdgeParity(leaf, faceMap[index][1]) + 
00557                 getEdgeParity(leaf, faceMap[index][2]) + 
00558                 getEdgeParity(leaf, faceMap[index][3]);
00559         return (a & 1);
00560     }
00561     int getFaceEdgeNum(LeafNode* leaf, int index)
00562     {
00563         int a = getEdgeParity(leaf, faceMap[index][0]) + 
00564                 getEdgeParity(leaf, faceMap[index][1]) + 
00565                 getEdgeParity(leaf, faceMap[index][2]) + 
00566                 getEdgeParity(leaf, faceMap[index][3]);
00567         return a;
00568     }
00569 
00571     void flipEdge(LeafNode* leaf, int index) 
00572     {
00573         assert(index >= 0 && index <= 11);
00574 
00575         leaf->edge_parity ^= (1 << index);
00576     }
00577     
00579     void setEdge(LeafNode* leaf, int index) 
00580     {
00581         assert(index >= 0 && index <= 11);
00582 
00583         leaf->edge_parity |= (1 << index);
00584     }
00585     
00587     void resetEdge(LeafNode* leaf, int index) 
00588     {
00589         assert(index >= 0 && index <= 11);
00590 
00591         leaf->edge_parity &= ~(1 << index);
00592     }

00595     void createPrimalEdgesMask(LeafNode* leaf)
00596     {
00597         leaf->primary_edge_intersections = getPrimalEdgesMask2(leaf);
00598     }
00599 
00600     void setStoredEdgesParity(LeafNode* leaf, int pindex)
00601     {
00602         assert(pindex <= 2 && pindex >= 0);
00603         
00604         leaf->primary_edge_intersections |= (1 << pindex);
00605     }
00606     int getStoredEdgesParity(LeafNode* leaf, int pindex)
00607     {
00608         assert(pindex <= 2 && pindex >= 0);
00609         
00610         return (leaf->primary_edge_intersections >> pindex) & 1;
00611     }
00612 
00613     LeafNode* flipEdge(LeafNode* leaf, int index, float alpha)
00614     {
00615         flipEdge(leaf, index);
00616 
00617         if((index & 3) == 0)
00618         {
00619             int ind = index / 4;
00620             if(getEdgeParity(leaf, index) && ! getStoredEdgesParity(leaf, ind))
00621             {
00622                 // Create a new node
00623                 int num = getNumEdges(leaf) + 1;
00624                 setStoredEdgesParity(leaf, ind);
00625                 int count = getEdgeCount(leaf, ind);
00626                 LeafNode* nleaf = createLeaf(num);
00627                 *nleaf = *leaf;
00628 
00629                 setEdgeOffset(nleaf, alpha, count);
00630 
00631                 if(num > 1)
00632                 {
00633                     float *pts = leaf->edge_intersections;
00634                     float *npts = nleaf->edge_intersections;
00635                     for(int i = 0; i < count; i ++)
00636                     {
00637                         for(int j = 0; j < EDGE_FLOATS; j ++)
00638                         {
00639                             npts[i * EDGE_FLOATS + j] = pts[i * EDGE_FLOATS + j];
00640                         }
00641                     }
00642                     for(int i = count + 1; i < num; i ++)
00643                     {
00644                         for(int j = 0; j < EDGE_FLOATS; j ++)
00645                         {
00646                             npts[i * EDGE_FLOATS + j] = pts[(i - 1) * EDGE_FLOATS + j];
00647                         }
00648                     }
00649                 }
00650 
00651                 
00652                 removeLeaf(num-1, (LeafNode*)leaf);
00653                 leaf = nleaf;
00654             }
00655         }
00656 
00657         return leaf;
00658     }
00659 
00661     void updateParent(InternalNode* node, int len, int st[3], LeafNode* leaf)
00662     {
00663         // First, locate the parent
00664         int count;
00665         InternalNode* parent = locateParent(node, len, st, count);
00666 
00667         // Update
00668         setChild(parent, count, (Node*)leaf);
00669     }
00670 
00671     void updateParent(InternalNode* node, int len, int st[3]) 
00672     {
00673         if(len == dimen)
00674         {
00675             root = (Node*)node;
00676             return;
00677         }
00678 
00679         // First, locate the parent
00680         int count;
00681         InternalNode* parent = locateParent(len, st, count);
00682 
00683         // UPdate
00684         setChild(parent, count, (Node*)node);
00685     }
00686 
00688     int getEdgeIntersectionByIndex(int st[3], int index, float pt[3], int check)
00689     {
00690         // First, locat the leaf
00691         LeafNode* leaf;
00692         if(check)
00693         {
00694             leaf = locateLeafCheck(st);
00695         }
00696         else
00697         {
00698             leaf = locateLeaf(st);
00699         }
00700 
00701         if(leaf && getStoredEdgesParity(leaf, index))
00702         {
00703             float off = getEdgeOffset(leaf, getEdgeCount(leaf, index));
00704             pt[0] =(float) st[0];
00705             pt[1] =(float) st[1];
00706             pt[2] =(float) st[2];
00707             pt[index] += off * mindimen;
00708 
00709             return 1;
00710         }
00711         else
00712         {
00713             return 0;
00714         }
00715     }
00716 
00718     int getPrimalEdgesMask(LeafNode* leaf)
00719     {
00720         return leaf->primary_edge_intersections;
00721     }
00722 
00723     int getPrimalEdgesMask2(LeafNode* leaf)
00724     {
00725         return (((leaf->edge_parity &   0x1) >> 0) |
00726                 ((leaf->edge_parity &  0x10) >> 3) |
00727                 ((leaf->edge_parity & 0x100) >> 6));
00728     }
00729 
00731     int getEdgeCount(LeafNode* leaf, int index)
00732     {
00733         return edgeCountTable[getPrimalEdgesMask(leaf)][index];
00734     }
00735     int getNumEdges(LeafNode* leaf)
00736     {
00737         return numEdgeTable[getPrimalEdgesMask(leaf)];
00738     }
00739 
00740     int getNumEdges2(LeafNode* leaf)
00741     {
00742         return numEdgeTable[getPrimalEdgesMask2(leaf)];
00743     }
00744 
00746     void setEdgeOffset(LeafNode* leaf, float pt, int count)
00747     {
00748         float *pts = leaf->edge_intersections;
00749         pts[EDGE_FLOATS * count] = pt;
00750         pts[EDGE_FLOATS * count + 1] = 0;
00751         pts[EDGE_FLOATS * count + 2] = 0;
00752         pts[EDGE_FLOATS * count + 3] = 0;
00753     }
00754 
00756     void setEdgeOffsets(LeafNode* leaf, float pt[3], int len)
00757     {
00758         float * pts = leaf->edge_intersections;
00759         for(int i = 0; i < len; i ++)
00760         {
00761             pts[i] = pt[i];
00762         }
00763     }
00764 
00766     float getEdgeOffset(LeafNode* leaf, int count)
00767     {
00768         return leaf->edge_intersections[4 * count];
00769     }
00770 
00772     LeafNode* updateEdgeOffsets(LeafNode* leaf, int oldlen, int newlen, float offs[3])
00773     {
00774         // First, create a new leaf node
00775         LeafNode* nleaf = createLeaf(newlen);
00776         *nleaf = *leaf;
00777 
00778         // Next, fill in the offsets
00779         setEdgeOffsets(nleaf, offs, newlen);
00780 
00781         // Finally, delete the old leaf
00782         removeLeaf(oldlen, leaf);
00783 
00784         return nleaf;
00785     }

00790         leaf->minimizer_index = index;

00795     {
00796         return leaf->minimizer_index;
00797     }
00798     
00799     int getMinimizerIndex(LeafNode* leaf, int eind)
00800     {
00801         int add = manifold_table[getSignMask(leaf)].pairs[eind][0] - 1;
00802         assert(add >= 0);
00803         return leaf->minimizer_index + add;
00804     }
00805 
00806     void getMinimizerIndices(LeafNode* leaf, int eind, int inds[2])
00807     {
00808         const int* add = manifold_table[getSignMask(leaf)].pairs[eind];
00809         inds[0] = leaf->minimizer_index + add[0] - 1;
00810         if(add[0] == add[1])
00811         {
00812             inds[1] = -1;
00813         }
00814         else
00815         {
00816             inds[1] = leaf->minimizer_index + add[1] - 1;
00817         }
00818     }
00819 
00820 
00822     void setEdgeOffsetNormal(LeafNode* leaf, float pt, float a, float b, float c, int count)
00823     {
00824         float * pts = leaf->edge_intersections;
00825         pts[4 * count] = pt;
00826         pts[4 * count + 1] = a;
00827         pts[4 * count + 2] = b;
00828         pts[4 * count + 3] = c;
00829     }
00830 
00831     float getEdgeOffsetNormal(LeafNode* leaf, int count, float& a, float& b, float& c)
00832     {
00833         float * pts = leaf->edge_intersections;
00834         a = pts[4 * count + 1];
00835         b = pts[4 * count + 2];
00836         c = pts[4 * count + 3];
00837         return pts[4 * count];
00838     }
00839 
00841     void setEdgeOffsetsNormals(LeafNode* leaf, float pt[], float a[], float b[], float c[], int len)
00842     {
00843         float *pts = leaf->edge_intersections;
00844         for(int i = 0; i < len; i ++)
00845         {
00846             if(pt[i] > 1 || pt[i] < 0)
00847             {
00848                 printf("\noffset: %f\n", pt[i]);
00849             }
00850             pts[i * 4] = pt[i];
00851             pts[i * 4 + 1] = a[i];
00852             pts[i * 4 + 2] = b[i];
00853             pts[i * 4 + 3] = c[i];
00854         }
00855     }
00856 
00858     void getEdgeIntersectionByIndex(LeafNode* leaf, int index, int st[3], int len, float pt[3], float nm[3])
00859     {
00860         int count = getEdgeCount(leaf, index);
00861         float *pts = leaf->edge_intersections;
00862         
00863         float off = pts[4 * count];
00864         
00865         pt[0] = (float) st[0];
00866         pt[1] = (float) st[1];
00867         pt[2] = (float) st[2];
00868         pt[index] +=(off * len);
00869 
00870         nm[0] = pts[4 * count + 1];
00871         nm[1] = pts[4 * count + 2];
00872         nm[2] = pts[4 * count + 3];
00873     }
00874 
00875     float getEdgeOffsetNormalByIndex(LeafNode* leaf, int index, float nm[3])
00876     {
00877         int count = getEdgeCount(leaf, index);
00878         float *pts = leaf->edge_intersections;
00879         
00880         float off = pts[4 * count];
00881         
00882         nm[0] = pts[4 * count + 1];
00883         nm[1] = pts[4 * count + 2];
00884         nm[2] = pts[4 * count + 3];
00885 
00886         return off;
00887     }
00888 
00889     void fillEdgeIntersections(LeafNode* leaf, int st[3], int len, float pts[12][3], float norms[12][3])
00890     {
00891         int i;
00892         // int stt[3] = {0, 0, 0};
00893 
00894         // The three primal edges are easy
00895         int pmask[3] = {0, 4, 8};
00896         for(i = 0; i < 3; i ++)
00897         {
00898             if(getEdgeParity(leaf, pmask[i]))
00899             {
00900                 // getEdgeIntersectionByIndex(leaf, i, stt, 1, pts[pmask[i]], norms[pmask[i]]);
00901                 getEdgeIntersectionByIndex(leaf, i, st, len, pts[pmask[i]], norms[pmask[i]]);
00902             }
00903         }
00904         
00905         // 3 face adjacent cubes
00906         int fmask[3][2] = {{6,10},{2,9},{1,5}};
00907         int femask[3][2] = {{1,2},{0,2},{0,1}};
00908         for(i = 0; i < 3; i ++)
00909         {
00910             int e1 = getEdgeParity(leaf, fmask[i][0]);
00911             int e2 = getEdgeParity(leaf, fmask[i][1]);
00912             if(e1 || e2)
00913             {
00914                 int nst[3] = {st[0], st[1], st[2]};
00915                 nst[i] += len;
00916                 // int nstt[3] = {0, 0, 0};
00917                 // nstt[i] += 1;
00918                 LeafNode* node = locateLeaf(nst);
00919                 
00920                 if(e1)
00921                 {
00922                     // getEdgeIntersectionByIndex(node, femask[i][0], nstt, 1, pts[fmask[i][0]], norms[fmask[i][0]]);
00923                     getEdgeIntersectionByIndex(node, femask[i][0], nst, len, pts[fmask[i][0]], norms[fmask[i][0]]);
00924                 }
00925                 if(e2)
00926                 {
00927                     // getEdgeIntersectionByIndex(node, femask[i][1], nstt, 1, pts[fmask[i][1]], norms[fmask[i][1]]);
00928                     getEdgeIntersectionByIndex(node, femask[i][1], nst, len, pts[fmask[i][1]], norms[fmask[i][1]]);
00929                 }
00930             }
00931         }
00932         
00933         // 3 edge adjacent cubes
00934         int emask[3] = {3, 7, 11};
00935         int eemask[3] = {0, 1, 2};
00936         for(i = 0; i < 3; i ++)
00937         {
00938             if(getEdgeParity(leaf, emask[i]))
00939             {
00940                 int nst[3] = {st[0] + len, st[1] + len, st[2] + len};
00941                 nst[i] -= len;
00942                 // int nstt[3] = {1, 1, 1};
00943                 // nstt[i] -= 1;
00944                 LeafNode* node = locateLeaf(nst);
00945                 
00946                 // getEdgeIntersectionByIndex(node, eemask[i], nstt, 1, pts[emask[i]], norms[emask[i]]);
00947                 getEdgeIntersectionByIndex(node, eemask[i], nst, len, pts[emask[i]], norms[emask[i]]);
00948             }
00949         }
00950     }
00951 
00952 
00953     void fillEdgeIntersections(LeafNode* leaf, int st[3], int len, float pts[12][3], float norms[12][3], int parity[12])
00954     {
00955         int i;
00956         for(i = 0; i < 12; i ++)
00957         {
00958             parity[i] = 0;
00959         }
00960         // int stt[3] = {0, 0, 0};
00961 
00962         // The three primal edges are easy
00963         int pmask[3] = {0, 4, 8};
00964         for(i = 0; i < 3; i ++)
00965         {
00966             if(getStoredEdgesParity(leaf, i))
00967             {
00968                 // getEdgeIntersectionByIndex(leaf, i, stt, 1, pts[pmask[i]], norms[pmask[i]]);
00969                 getEdgeIntersectionByIndex(leaf, i, st, len, pts[pmask[i]], norms[pmask[i]]);
00970                 parity[pmask[i]] = 1;
00971             }
00972         }
00973         
00974         // 3 face adjacent cubes
00975         int fmask[3][2] = {{6,10},{2,9},{1,5}};
00976         int femask[3][2] = {{1,2},{0,2},{0,1}};
00977         for(i = 0; i < 3; i ++)
00978         {
00979             {
00980                 int nst[3] = {st[0], st[1], st[2]};
00981                 nst[i] += len;
00982                 // int nstt[3] = {0, 0, 0};
00983                 // nstt[i] += 1;
00984                 LeafNode* node = locateLeafCheck(nst);
00985                 if(node == NULL)
00986                 {
00987                     continue;
00988                 }
00989         
00990                 int e1 = getStoredEdgesParity(node, femask[i][0]);
00991                 int e2 = getStoredEdgesParity(node, femask[i][1]);
00992                 
00993                 if(e1)
00994                 {
00995                     // getEdgeIntersectionByIndex(node, femask[i][0], nstt, 1, pts[fmask[i][0]], norms[fmask[i][0]]);
00996                     getEdgeIntersectionByIndex(node, femask[i][0], nst, len, pts[fmask[i][0]], norms[fmask[i][0]]);
00997                     parity[fmask[i][0]] = 1;
00998                 }
00999                 if(e2)
01000                 {
01001                     // getEdgeIntersectionByIndex(node, femask[i][1], nstt, 1, pts[fmask[i][1]], norms[fmask[i][1]]);
01002                     getEdgeIntersectionByIndex(node, femask[i][1], nst, len, pts[fmask[i][1]], norms[fmask[i][1]]);
01003                     parity[fmask[i][1]] = 1;
01004                 }
01005             }
01006         }
01007         
01008         // 3 edge adjacent cubes
01009         int emask[3] = {3, 7, 11};
01010         int eemask[3] = {0, 1, 2};
01011         for(i = 0; i < 3; i ++)
01012         {
01013 //          if(getEdgeParity(leaf, emask[i]))
01014             {
01015                 int nst[3] = {st[0] + len, st[1] + len, st[2] + len};
01016                 nst[i] -= len;
01017                 // int nstt[3] = {1, 1, 1};
01018                 // nstt[i] -= 1;
01019                 LeafNode* node = locateLeafCheck(nst);
01020                 if(node == NULL)
01021                 {
01022                     continue;
01023                 }
01024                 
01025                 if(getStoredEdgesParity(node, eemask[i]))
01026                 {
01027                     // getEdgeIntersectionByIndex(node, eemask[i], nstt, 1, pts[emask[i]], norms[emask[i]]);
01028                     getEdgeIntersectionByIndex(node, eemask[i], nst, len, pts[emask[i]], norms[emask[i]]);
01029                     parity[emask[i]] = 1;
01030                 }
01031             }
01032         }
01033     }
01034 
01035     void fillEdgeOffsetsNormals(LeafNode* leaf, int st[3], int len, float pts[12], float norms[12][3], int parity[12])
01036     {
01037         int i;
01038         for(i = 0; i < 12; i ++)
01039         {
01040             parity[i] = 0;
01041         }
01042         // int stt[3] = {0, 0, 0};
01043 
01044         // The three primal edges are easy
01045         int pmask[3] = {0, 4, 8};
01046         for(i = 0; i < 3; i ++)
01047         {
01048             if(getStoredEdgesParity(leaf, i))
01049             {
01050                 pts[pmask[i]] = getEdgeOffsetNormalByIndex(leaf, i, norms[pmask[i]]);
01051                 parity[pmask[i]] = 1;
01052             }
01053         }
01054         
01055         // 3 face adjacent cubes
01056         int fmask[3][2] = {{6,10},{2,9},{1,5}};
01057         int femask[3][2] = {{1,2},{0,2},{0,1}};
01058         for(i = 0; i < 3; i ++)
01059         {
01060             {
01061                 int nst[3] = {st[0], st[1], st[2]};
01062                 nst[i] += len;
01063                 // int nstt[3] = {0, 0, 0};
01064                 // nstt[i] += 1;
01065                 LeafNode* node = locateLeafCheck(nst);
01066                 if(node == NULL)
01067                 {
01068                     continue;
01069                 }
01070         
01071                 int e1 = getStoredEdgesParity(node, femask[i][0]);
01072                 int e2 = getStoredEdgesParity(node, femask[i][1]);
01073                 
01074                 if(e1)
01075                 {
01076                     pts[fmask[i][0]] = getEdgeOffsetNormalByIndex(node, femask[i][0], norms[fmask[i][0]]);
01077                     parity[fmask[i][0]] = 1;
01078                 }
01079                 if(e2)
01080                 {
01081                     pts[fmask[i][1]] = getEdgeOffsetNormalByIndex(node, femask[i][1], norms[fmask[i][1]]);
01082                     parity[fmask[i][1]] = 1;
01083                 }
01084             }
01085         }
01086         
01087         // 3 edge adjacent cubes
01088         int emask[3] = {3, 7, 11};
01089         int eemask[3] = {0, 1, 2};
01090         for(i = 0; i < 3; i ++)
01091         {
01092 //          if(getEdgeParity(leaf, emask[i]))
01093             {
01094                 int nst[3] = {st[0] + len, st[1] + len, st[2] + len};
01095                 nst[i] -= len;
01096                 // int nstt[3] = {1, 1, 1};
01097                 // nstt[i] -= 1;
01098                 LeafNode* node = locateLeafCheck(nst);
01099                 if(node == NULL)
01100                 {
01101                     continue;
01102                 }
01103                 
01104                 if(getStoredEdgesParity(node, eemask[i]))
01105                 {
01106                     pts[emask[i]] = getEdgeOffsetNormalByIndex(node, eemask[i], norms[emask[i]]);
01107                     parity[emask[i]] = 1;
01108                 }
01109             }
01110         }
01111     }
01112 
01113 
01115     LeafNode* updateEdgeOffsetsNormals(LeafNode* leaf, int oldlen, int newlen, float offs[3], float a[3], float b[3], float c[3])
01116     {
01117         // First, create a new leaf node
01118         LeafNode* nleaf = createLeaf(newlen);
01119         *nleaf = *leaf;
01120 
01121         // Next, fill in the offsets
01122         setEdgeOffsetsNormals(nleaf, offs, a, b, c, newlen);
01123 
01124         // Finally, delete the old leaf
01125         removeLeaf(oldlen, leaf);
01126 
01127         return nleaf;
01128     }
01129 
01132     
01133     LeafNode* locateLeaf(int st[3])
01134     {
01135         Node* node = (Node*)root;
01136         for(int i = GRID_DIMENSION - 1; i > GRID_DIMENSION - maxDepth - 1; i --)
01137         {
01138             int index =(((st[0] >> i) & 1) << 2) | 
01139                         (((st[1] >> i) & 1) << 1) | 
01140                         (((st[2] >> i) & 1));
01141             node = getChild(&node->internal, getChildCount(&node->internal, index));
01142         }
01143 
01144         return &node->leaf;
01145     }
01146     
01147     LeafNode* locateLeaf(InternalNode* parent, int len, int st[3])
01148     {
01149         Node *node = (Node*)parent;
01150         int index;
01151         for(int i = len / 2; i >= mindimen; i >>= 1)
01152         {
01153             index =(((st[0] & i) ? 4 : 0) | 
01154                     ((st[1] & i) ? 2 : 0) | 
01155                     ((st[2] & i) ? 1 : 0));
01156             node = getChild(&node->internal,
01157                             getChildCount(&node->internal, index));
01158         }
01159 
01160         return &node->leaf;
01161     }
01162 
01163     LeafNode* locateLeafCheck(int st[3])
01164     {
01165         Node* node = (Node*)root;
01166         for(int i = GRID_DIMENSION - 1; i > GRID_DIMENSION - maxDepth - 1; i --)
01167         {
01168             int index =(((st[0] >> i) & 1) << 2) | 
01169                         (((st[1] >> i) & 1) << 1) | 
01170                         (((st[2] >> i) & 1));
01171             if(!hasChild(&node->internal, index))
01172             {
01173                 return NULL;
01174             }
01175             node = getChild(&node->internal, getChildCount(&node->internal, index));
01176         }
01177 
01178         return &node->leaf;
01179     }
01180 
01181     InternalNode* locateParent(int len, int st[3], int& count)
01182     {
01183         InternalNode* node = (InternalNode*)root;
01184         InternalNode* pre = NULL;
01185         int index = 0;
01186         for(int i = dimen / 2; i >= len; i >>= 1)
01187         {
01188             index =(((st[0] & i) ? 4 : 0) | 
01189                     ((st[1] & i) ? 2 : 0) | 
01190                     ((st[2] & i) ? 1 : 0));
01191             pre = node;
01192             node = &getChild(node, getChildCount(node, index))->internal;
01193         }
01194 
01195         count = getChildCount(pre, index);
01196         return pre;
01197     }
01198     
01199     InternalNode* locateParent(InternalNode* parent, int len, int st[3], int& count)
01200     {
01201         InternalNode* node = parent;
01202         InternalNode* pre = NULL;
01203         int index = 0;
01204         for(int i = len / 2; i >= mindimen; i >>= 1)
01205         {
01206             index =(((st[0] & i) ? 4 : 0) | 
01207                     ((st[1] & i) ? 2 : 0) | 
01208                     ((st[2] & i) ? 1 : 0));
01209             pre = node;
01210             node = (InternalNode*)getChild(node, getChildCount(node, index));
01211         }
01212 
01213         count = getChildCount(pre, index);
01214         return pre;
01215     }
01216     
01217     /************ Operators for internal nodes ************/
01218 
01220     int hasChild(InternalNode* node, int index)
01221     {
01222         return (node->has_child >> index) & 1;
01223     }
01224 
01226     int isLeaf(InternalNode* node, int index)
01227     {
01228         return (node->child_is_leaf >> index) & 1;
01229     }
01230 
01232     Node* getChild(InternalNode* node, int count)
01233     {
01234         return node->children[count];
01235     };
01236 
01238     int getNumChildren(InternalNode* node)
01239     {
01240         return numChildrenTable[node->has_child];
01241     }
01242 
01244     int getChildCount(InternalNode* node, int index)
01245     {
01246         return childrenCountTable[node->has_child][index];
01247     }
01248     int getChildIndex(InternalNode* node, int count)
01249     {
01250         return childrenIndexTable[node->has_child][count];
01251     }
01252     int* getChildCounts(InternalNode* node)
01253     {
01254         return childrenCountTable[node->has_child];
01255     }
01256 
01258     void fillChildren(InternalNode* node, Node* children[8], int leaf[8])
01259     {
01260         int count = 0;
01261         for(int i = 0; i < 8; i ++)
01262         {   
01263             leaf[i] = isLeaf(node, i);
01264             if(hasChild(node, i))
01265             {
01266                 children[i] = getChild(node, count);
01267                 count ++;
01268             }
01269             else
01270             {
01271                 children[i] = NULL;
01272                 leaf[i] = 0;
01273             }
01274         }
01275     }
01276 
01278     void setChild(InternalNode* node, int count, Node* chd)
01279     {
01280         node->children[count] = chd;
01281     }
01282     void setInternalChild(InternalNode* node, int index, int count, InternalNode* chd)
01283     {
01284         setChild(node, count, (Node*)chd);
01285         node->has_child |= (1 << index);
01286     }
01287     void setLeafChild(InternalNode* node, int index, int count, LeafNode* chd)
01288     {
01289         setChild(node, count, (Node*)chd);
01290         node->has_child |=(1 << index);
01291         node->child_is_leaf |= (1 << index);
01292     }
01293 
01297     InternalNode* addChild(InternalNode* node, int index, Node* child, int aLeaf)
01298     {
01299         // Create new internal node
01300         int num = getNumChildren(node);
01301         InternalNode* rnode = createInternal(num + 1);
01302 
01303         // Establish children
01304         int i;
01305         int count1 = 0, count2 = 0;
01306         for(i = 0; i < 8; i ++)
01307         {
01308             if(i == index)
01309             {
01310                 if(aLeaf)
01311                 {
01312                     setLeafChild(rnode, i, count2, &child->leaf);
01313                 }
01314                 else
01315                 {
01316                     setInternalChild(rnode, i, count2, &child->internal);
01317                 }
01318                 count2 ++;
01319             }
01320             else if(hasChild(node, i))
01321             {
01322                 if(isLeaf(node, i))
01323                 {
01324                     setLeafChild(rnode, i, count2, &getChild(node, count1)->leaf);
01325                 }
01326                 else
01327                 {
01328                     setInternalChild(rnode, i, count2, &getChild(node, count1)->internal);
01329                 }
01330                 count1 ++;
01331                 count2 ++;
01332             }
01333         }
01334 
01335         removeInternal(num, node);
01336         return rnode;
01337     }
01338 
01340     InternalNode* createInternal(int length)
01341     {
01342         InternalNode* inode = (InternalNode*)alloc[length]->allocate();
01343         inode->has_child = 0;
01344         inode->child_is_leaf = 0;
01345         return inode;
01346     }
01347     
01348     LeafNode* createLeaf(int length)
01349     {
01350         assert(length <= 3);
01351 
01352         LeafNode* lnode = (LeafNode*)leafalloc[length]->allocate();
01353         lnode->edge_parity = 0;
01354         lnode->primary_edge_intersections = 0;
01355         lnode->signs = 0;
01356 
01357         return lnode;
01358     }
01359 
01360     void removeInternal(int num, InternalNode* node)
01361     {
01362         alloc[num]->deallocate(node);
01363     }
01364 
01365     void removeLeaf(int num, LeafNode* leaf)
01366     {
01367         assert(num >= 0 && num <= 3);
01368         leafalloc[num]->deallocate(leaf);
01369     }
01370 
01372     InternalNode* addLeafChild(InternalNode* par, int index, int count,
01373                                LeafNode* leaf)
01374     {
01375         int num = getNumChildren(par) + 1;
01376         InternalNode* npar = createInternal(num);
01377         *npar = *par;
01378         
01379         if(num == 1)
01380         {
01381             setLeafChild(npar, index, 0, leaf);
01382         }
01383         else
01384         {
01385             int i;
01386             for(i = 0; i < count; i ++)
01387             {
01388                 setChild(npar, i, getChild(par, i));
01389             }
01390             setLeafChild(npar, index, count, leaf);
01391             for(i = count + 1; i < num; i ++)
01392             {
01393                 setChild(npar, i, getChild(par, i - 1));
01394             }
01395         }
01396         
01397         removeInternal(num-1, par);
01398         return npar;
01399     }
01400 
01401     InternalNode* addInternalChild(InternalNode* par, int index, int count,
01402                                    InternalNode* node)
01403     {
01404         int num = getNumChildren(par) + 1;
01405         InternalNode* npar = createInternal(num);
01406         *npar = *par;
01407         
01408         if(num == 1)
01409         {
01410             setInternalChild(npar, index, 0, node);
01411         }
01412         else
01413         {
01414             int i;
01415             for(i = 0; i < count; i ++)
01416             {
01417                 setChild(npar, i, getChild(par, i));
01418             }
01419             setInternalChild(npar, index, count, node);
01420             for(i = count + 1; i < num; i ++)
01421             {
01422                 setChild(npar, i, getChild(par, i - 1));
01423             }
01424         }
01425         
01426         removeInternal(num-1, par);
01427         return npar;
01428     }
01429 };
